mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, tags, genre, color, shot_date, image_path, created_at, updated_at FROM photos ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photos (title, description, tags, genre, color, shot_date, image_path, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{tags}, #{genre}, #{color}, #{shotDate}, #{imagePath}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE photos SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, tags = #{tags}, genre = #{genre}, color = #{color}, shot_date = #{shotDate}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
